transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, haanji sir aap bataiye kya kya hua tha aap call kar rahe the?
Customer: Haan, main kal Ghaziabad Enterprise se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Customer: Jo kal haan haan jo kal connect kare the na humne wo PC mein connect kiya tha kal humne wo category change kiya tha sab.
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Customer: Haan wo category change karne par wo abhi jo bylead jo PC gun cylinder aur set ki jo bylead aane wali hai na wo.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Uski jagah abhi wo do din se air compressor ki bylead aa rahi hai air compressor ki sabhi bylead wo PC gun ki chahiye aur jo set aata hai wo breaking gear set.
Pura mask wo set aata hai uski bylead chahiye aur do din se yahi bylead aaj aane lagi hai wo.
Executive: But humne change to kal kara tha na aapne bola aap hi ne to bataya tha mujhe ki ye is isme add karo is isme add karo aapne jaise aise bataya tha maine usi ke according kara tha.
Customer: Haan aapki aapki baat sahi hai mana nahi kara par wo jo cylinder ki jo bylead aane wali hai iski jagah wo sare jo compressor ki aane lagi hai aaj sare compressor ki bylead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek second sir.



Basically aapka main wo ek minute wo khol rahi hu aap ek minute call pe rahiye.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai thik hai aap dekh lijiye warna fir connect karte hai main abhi bahar aaya hun.
Wo bylead ke bare mein wo wo tha ki wo jo cylinder ki aur set ki jo bylead jyada aani chahiye wo compressor ki kam ho aaj sare compressor ki bylead thi abhi.

Wo aapki jo category wala aap mujhe jo bata rahe hai na.
Customer: Wo category haan wo to maine aapko bataya waise hi aapne kar diya wo sahi hai par wo bylead jo aane wali hai wo cylinder ki aur set jo pura aata hai mask wo ki bylead milna chahiye.
Executive: Haan main aapki wo catalog open kar rahi hu ek second dijiye.
Customer: Haan aaram se aap kar dijiye abhi main bahar hu party fire ke sath baitha hu to main aapko thodi der mein call kar sakta hu.

Hello.
Executive: Haanji sir jaise aapne mujhe bataya tha na ki aapki category check kar rahi thi.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai aap check kar lijiye main bhi ek buyer ke sath baitha hu to main aapko thodi der mein call karta hu.
Executive: Ek bar agar abhi mujhe category aap abhi ke abhi confirm kar dete the to main ya to ek kam
Ye rehta hai na ki jaise aapko jo product chahiye tha wo kaunse wala tha?
Customer: Wo PC gun cylinder jo maine list kiya hai PC gun cylinder.
Executive: PC gun wala cylinder.
Executive: Aur jo humne wo bylead wagera jaise category jo add kari thi wo usi ki bhi pura mask wagera aana chahiye aapke pass?
Customer: Haan haan wo pura set wala aur jo sirf cylinder wala wo bylead aani chahiye to pura wo compressor ki bylead aane lagi hai pura compressor hai.
Executive: To compressor wali ab aapke pass aa rahi hai pehle cylinder wali aapne mangi thi.
Customer: Haan haan cylinder wali sirf cylinder nahi cylinder aur set jo pura mask wo aata hai na uski bylead chahiye abhi wo jyada compressor ki kam ho to chalega wo abhi sare compressor ki dikh rahi hai abhi.
Executive: To abhi to aapko bilkul bhi matlab sari ki sari compressor ki dikh rahi hai to aapne usko consume kara bylead ko?
Customer: Nahi nahi compressor ki nahi chahiye abhi wo ek do aaye to ache wo sari compressor ki kya abhi kar sakte hai abhi.
Executive: Haan sari compressor ki karoge to fir wahi wala focus abhi focus abhi cylinder hai aata hai sirf cylinder aur pura set aata hai mask wagera uski bylead chahiye abhi sab.

Executive: To isme jo jaise jo aapne categories wagera add karwai thi na.
Customer: Haan wo category add karwai thi abhi ek bar hum connect karke dekh lete hai ki koi galti ya dusri category to add nahi ho gayi hai abhi wo bylead.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap dekhiye ab aapko bylead jo aa to rahi hai but waisi nahi aa rahi jaisi aapko chahiye ab compressor ki isme dekh rahe hai ki jaise elephant compressor ki do ghante pehle aayi hui hai air compressor ki aayi hui hai.
Customer: Air compressor ki jyada nahi chahiye compressor ki kam aaye to chalega kyuki compressor mein deal nahi karta main wo sab cylinder aur set mein deal karta hu mask wo set wala na wo cylinder mein hi jyada deal karta hu.
Executive: Compressor ki main batati hu kyu aa rahi hai kyuki compressor isme aapne kal bahut sare mein add karwa diya hai uski to chaliye koi baat nahi add kara diya tha wo main hatwa.
Customer: Compressor compressor ki aaye to acha hai par wo jyada nahi wo set ki wo cylinder ki to uske sath aana hi chahiye wo pura compressor uski bylead aaye aisa nahi chahiye.
Executive: Haan wo thik hai to ek kam karte hai main aapko ya to monday ko connect karti hu aapki jab tak bylead aap dekh lijiye kyuki abhi compressor ki humne kari compressor ke sath sath aur bhi byleads humne matlab aur bhi category add karni hai to ho sakta hai uski kal aa jaye ya main uski bylead upar se na rakhu lekin main aapki bylead.
Customer: Aap abhi buyer ke sath baitha hu na sir main aapko aapko call back karta hu sir.
Executive: Main aapko monday ko connect karti hu sir aapko thik hai.
Customer: Ok ok ok.
Executive: Ok sir main aapko monday ko connect karti hu.
Customer: Haan ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buyleads for cylinder and set.

- Receiving buyleads for air compressors instead.



Resolution:

- Executive will check the category settings.

- Executive will connect on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, cylinder, compressor
